subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: My un-understanding

Most people I know are=C2=A0in a group are not in it to be scared..Like you=
 Adriana=C2=A0they looking for proof of some kind..I'm a founder of a group=
..but I don't go ghost hunting..lol I don't have to,=C2=A0 I understand tha=
t some people are still looking for personal reasons or just being curious.=
..I don't have my group paying for places we go..unless its like a very hot=
 spot such as Mansfield which we are going in April but most places we go w=
e are invited free of charge..we were just at a "haunted hotel" for free.

=
--- On Thu, 2/10/11, Adriana Jones <adrianamjones@...> wrote:


From:=
 Adriana Jones <adrianamjones@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: My un-under=
standing
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Thursday, February 10, 2011, 4:2=
4 PM


=C2=A0 



I never wanted to be scared. That was never my intention =
when I joined a ghosthunting group. I just wanted to make contact with some=
thing other than physical human. And I definitely got to, even felt what wa=
s apparently a ghost (the tingling feeling in the air). And I was happy, an=
d it felt peaceful. I think I'd be equally happy to meet a space alien comi=
ng out of a spaceship. As long as they didn't laser beam me when I go to hu=
g them. :)

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Adriana Jones" <adrianamjones@=
...> wrote:
>
> Agreed. I was introduced to the ghost box at a paranormal g=
roup meeting, but ever since then the vast majority of my sessions have bee=
n at home. I went to a few cemeteries at midnight at first, but that quickl=
y wore off when I realized that I get equal, and even better, communication=
, just sitting at the dining room table.
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@...=
m, "purplespacefriend" <purplealiengirl@> wrote:
> >
> > My approach to EVP=
 and ITC is for spirit communcation not associated with supposed hauntings.=
 That's why I find it frustrating that most insist on running aorund in the=
 dark to get evidence and EVP when they could stay home and get much more. =
Spirits and entities travel, even the ones that are supposedly stuck will c=
ome to you if asked. I don't like the Halloween, and fear crap. I think mos=
t just want to be frightened, so they pay gigabucks to go the haunted hot s=
pots hoping beyond hope to get scared out their wits by imaginary demons.
>=
 > 
> > F-S
> >
>
